oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Letter by Herbert Solomon Garner to W. O. Garner about East Tennessee and self-sufficiency
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Garner, Herbert Solomon
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Correspondence; Garner, Herbert Solomon; Garner, William Orland; Maryville (Tenn.); Pomona (Calif.); Transcript
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A letter by Herbert Solomon Garner to W. O. Garner about trying to get money to pay back a loan, life in East Tennessee during the depression, and having TVA visit to see how he is able to live self sufficiently.
